title: Local 2D fighting game featuring Sonic-like and Tails-like characters

requirements.text: Create a playable local 2D fighting game in the React frontend with two characters (a blue hedgehog-like character and an orange two-tailed fox-like character) that can fight each other on the same keyboard.

quotes: create a game with sonic and tails figthing

acceptanceCriteria: The app loads into a playable fighting game without requiring authentication.
Two distinct playable fighters are available at match start: a hedgehog-like character and a two-tailed fox-like character.
Both fighters can be controlled simultaneously on one keyboard (separate keybinds per player).
A match can be completed (one player wins) without errors or page reloads.

requirements.text: Implement core combat mechanics: movement, jumping, facing direction, basic attacks, hit detection, damage, knockback, health bars, round/win state, and match reset.

quotes: create a game with sonic and tails figthing

acceptanceCriteria: Each player can move left/right and jump.
Each player has at least two attacks (e.g., quick jab and heavy attack) with different range and/or damage.
Attacks only apply damage when hitboxes overlap during active frames; no damage is applied outside attack windows.
Health bars update correctly and cannot go below 0.
When a player reaches 0 health, the game shows the winner and offers a restart that resets health/positions/state.

requirements.text: Add a simple game UI: title/start screen, controls/help overlay, in-match HUD (names + health), pause/resume, and game-over screen. Use English for all on-screen text.

quotes: create a game with sonic and tails figthing

acceptanceCriteria: A start screen is shown with a clear “Start” action.
A controls/help overlay is available from the start screen and/or during the match.
An in-match HUD shows both player names and health.
A pause toggle stops gameplay updates (movement/attacks/health changes) until resumed.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add a coherent visual theme for the game UI and scene (colors, typography, layout) and apply it consistently across start screen, HUD, overlays, and game-over screen (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
acceptanceCriteria: The UI uses a consistent color palette and typography across all screens.
The palette is not primarily blue/purple; it should fit an energetic arcade fighting vibe (e.g., warm neon, sunset, or industrial).
Buttons, panels, and HUD elements share consistent styling (spacing, borders, shadows).

requirements.text: Use generated static art assets (background + character sprites) stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the game (fighters and stage).

quotes: create a game with sonic and tails figthing

acceptanceCriteria: The stage background is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated and visible during gameplay.
Both fighters are represented with static sprites or simple frame-based sprites loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated.
No image assets are served from the backend canister; they are loaded as static frontend assets.

constraints: Respect the platform’s single-actor backend architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep the game fully local/offline (no real-time networking/websockets).
Avoid using trademarked/copyrighted official Sonic/Tails artwork; use original, lookalike-inspired designs instead.
nonGoals: Persistent progression, inventories, or complex RPG systems
3D gameplay (unless needed incidentally for rendering; the game should function as a simple 2D fighter)

required: Arcade fighting stage background with dynamic lighting and motion lines (stage-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Blue hedgehog-like fighter sprite sheet, 6-frame grid, transparent background (hedgehog-fighter-sprites.dim_768x512.png)
Orange two-tailed fox-like fighter sprite sheet, 6-frame grid, transparent background (fox-fighter-sprites.dim_768x512.png)
HUD panel elements: two health bar frames and a center round indicator, transparent background (hud-elements.dim_1024x256.png)
